issue.title: Novatech DDS9m digital-gate being inappropriately held to DDS table pseudoclock

content.raw:
This made me suspicious that it was a deep-seated timing problem in labscript, as Chris alluded to the most recent bugfix. 

So I reverted to `05cf8b9676a9`, removing the GatedClocks-bugfix merge. 

Then all is well!

Shots compile. And better, they run and produce nice fluoroscence images!

And indeed @{557058:52a111e4-40da-4441-9143-417f95f2db97} 's commit `b74958231436` does seem to edit code in and around this error message…
content.html:
This made me suspicious that it was a deep-seated timing problem in labscript, as Chris alluded to the most recent bugfix.

So I reverted to 05cf8b9676a9, removing the GatedClocks-bugfix merge.

Then all is well!

Shots compile. And better, they run and produce nice fluoroscence images!

And indeed @Philip Starkey 's commit b74958231436 does seem to edit code in and around this error message…
